idea-plugin.name: Nopol-Plugin
idea-plugin.description: Nopol User Interface Intellij What this plugin does? This plugin allows to automatically fix program by changing condition (if) or by adding a pre-condition, using a failing test case, and others success test cases. Using Nopol and its server, you can run it on your own computer, or ask for support on the librepair infrastructure. How? From a failling test cases, Nopol is able to propose a patch that will make your test case green. Librepair The librepair project is within the spirals team at Inria, which is a french research institute. further information: nopol,nopol-ui-intellij,spirals Contributions Found a bug? You want to contribute? Any questions? Do not hesitate to open issues or pull-request on the github repositories.
